theHuman:Defend.NAME: Defend
theHuman:Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL [#34eb52]Pacifist: Gain !B! Peaceful instead.

theHuman:KungFu.NAME: Kung Fu!
theHuman:KungFu.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card. NL Gain 1 Healthiness. NL [#a83277]Technique: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
theHuman:KungFu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 Healthiness. NL [#a83277]Technique: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theHuman:Focused.NAME: Focused
theHuman:Focused.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and gain 2 Block.

theHuman:Scuffle.NAME: Scuffle
theHuman:Scuffle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !D! times. NL The number of times this effect is repeated increases with Strength. NL Discard a random card.

theHuman:Argument.NAME: Argument
theHuman:Argument.DESCRIPTION: Give an enemy 1 Strength. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

theHuman:NineToFive.NAME: Nine To Five
theHuman:NineToFive.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 5 Poison and 2 Weak to ALL enemies. NL Add a Tired to your draw pile.

theHuman:Tired.NAME: Tired
theHuman:Tired.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, Exhaust a random card in your hand and lose 2 Healthiness.

theHuman:Alcohol.NAME: Alcohol
theHuman:Alcohol.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw and discard 3 cards. NL Lose 1 Healthiness.

theHuman:BackhandSlap.NAME: Backhand Slap
theHuman:BackhandSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! *Injured to an enemy. NL If this card is discarded, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theHuman:DumpsterDiving.NAME: Dumpster Diving
theHuman:DumpsterDiving.DESCRIPTION: Return !M! card from your discard pile to your hand. NL Find !theHuman:SecondMagic! Junk.

theHuman:BirthdayCake.NAME: Birthday Cake
theHuman:BirthdayCake.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Birthday Presents to your hand.

theHuman:HealthyLifestyle.NAME: Healthy Lifestyle
theHuman:HealthyLifestyle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Healthiness. NL Draw a card.

theHuman:DrunkenBrawl.NAME: Drunken Brawl
theHuman:DrunkenBrawl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Discard !M! random cards. NL Gain !M! energy. NL Lose !M! Healthiness.

theHuman:PlasticBottle.NAME: Plastic Bottle
theHuman:PlasticBottle.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your hand to discard. NL If you do, restore 3 Health.

theHuman:SuckerPunch.NAME: Sucker Punch
theHuman:SuckerPunch.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy. NL Add 2 Slaps to your hand that cost 0, but Purge when used and at the end of your turn. NL [#a83277]Technique: Return a random card from your discard pile to your hand.

theHuman:Hobbyist.NAME: Hobbyist
theHuman:Hobbyist.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If your hand has no duplicates, draw triple this amount instead.
theHuman:Hobbyist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL If your hand has no duplicates, draw triple this amount instead and gain 1 energy.

theHuman:GarbageCollector.NAME: Garbage Collector
theHuman:GarbageCollector.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Junk card, add a random card to your hand and gain 4 Block.

theHuman:Consequences.NAME: Consequences
theHuman:Consequences.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this is drawn, shuffle a Doubt, Regret and Shame into your draw pile.

theHuman:Prank.NAME: Prank
theHuman:Prank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Stun an enemy. NL Shuffle a Consequences into your draw pile.

theHuman:Reading.NAME: Reading
theHuman:Reading.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Healthiness. NL Whenever you play a card, add a Deep Thought to your hand.

theHuman:DeepThought.NAME: Deep Thought
theHuman:DeepThought.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. Does not trigger Reading.

theHuman:Exercise.NAME: Exercise
theHuman:Exercise.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards. For each card Exhausted this way, gain !M! energy. NL [#34eb52]Pacifist: Restore 10 Health.

theHuman:Revolver.NAME: Revolver
theHuman:Revolver.DESCRIPTION: Shoot ( !D! x !M!,  !theHuman:SecondMagic! %  ) a random enemy. NL Return this to your hand. NL Inventory.

theHuman:GlassShard.NAME: Glass Shard
theHuman:GlassShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Injured to an enemy.

theHuman:Brick.NAME: Brick
theHuman:Brick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Stun an enemy. NL Shuffle an Injury into your draw pile.

theHuman:PepperSpray.NAME: Pepper Spray
theHuman:PepperSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Poison, Weak and Vulnerable to an enemy.

theHuman:LugerPistol.NAME: Luger Pistol
theHuman:LugerPistol.DESCRIPTION: Shoot ( !D! x !M!,  !theHuman:SecondMagic! %  ) an enemy. NL Return this to your hand. NL Inventory.

theHuman:OnTheStreets.NAME: On The Streets
theHuman:OnTheStreets.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Add a Weapon and !M! Junk to your hand. NL Uncover a card.

theHuman:FuriousSlap.NAME: Furious Slap
theHuman:FuriousSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL Shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile. NL Draw a card.

theHuman:Slaptacular.NAME: Slaptacular
theHuman:Slaptacular.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Replay all Slaps played this combat.

theHuman:TrashToTreasure.NAME: Trash To Treasure
theHuman:TrashToTreasure.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all Junk in your hand. NL For each Junk Exhausted this way, Uncover a card.

theHuman:Recycle.NAME: Recycle
theHuman:Recycle.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! random Junk into your draw pile. NL Shuffle your hand back into your draw pile. NL Then, draw that many cards.

theHuman:FollowUpSlap.NAME: Follow-Up Slap
theHuman:FollowUpSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy twice. NL Your Slaps deal 3 more damage this combat.

theHuman:CommunityService.NAME: Community Service
theHuman:CommunityService.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 3 Block and find 1 Junk.

theHuman:SelfDefense.NAME: Self Defense
theHuman:SelfDefense.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 Revolver, 1 Pepper Spray, 1 Kung Fu! and 1 Defend to your hand.

theHuman:Aggressiveness.NAME: Aggressiveness
theHuman:Aggressiveness.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and discard !M! card.

theHuman:Jab.NAME: Jab
theHuman:Jab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL [#a83277]Technique: Draw !M! card.

theHuman:AK47.NAME: AK-47
theHuman:AK47.DESCRIPTION: Shoot ( !D! x !M!,  !theHuman:SecondMagic! %  ) an enemy. NL Return this to your hand. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Inventory.

theHuman:SpringCleaning.NAME: Spring Cleaning
theHuman:SpringCleaning.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your discard pile. NL For each card Exhausted this way, deal !D! damage to all enemies.

theHuman:InThePark.NAME: In The Park
theHuman:InThePark.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Healthiness and Regen. NL Find !theHuman:SecondMagic! Junk. NL Draw a card.

theHuman:FrontKick.NAME: Front Kick
theHuman:FrontKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to an enemy. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL [#a83277]Technique: Gain 1 energy.

theHuman:Detoxification.NAME: Detoxification
theHuman:Detoxification.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust ALL Status and Curse cards in your hand, draw pile and discard pile.

theHuman:DesertEagle.NAME: Desert Eagle
theHuman:DesertEagle.DESCRIPTION: Shoot ( !D! x !M!,  !theHuman:SecondMagic! %  ) an enemy. NL Return this to your hand. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Inventory.

theHuman:DualWielding.NAME: Dual Wielding
theHuman:DualWielding.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Shoot a Weapon, Shoot (6 x 1, 10 %) a random enemy.

theHuman:Uppercut.NAME: Uppercut
theHuman:Uppercut.DESCRIPTION: When you draw this, deal !D! damage to a random enemy and shuffle a copy of this card back into your deck. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL [#a83277]Technique: Gain 1 Strength.

theHuman:PettyTheft.NAME: Petty Theft
theHuman:PettyTheft.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Find !M! Junk. NL Shuffle a Consequences into your deck.

theHuman:DoItYourself.NAME: Do It Yourself
theHuman:DoItYourself.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL If you have Junk in your hand, gain !M! energy and draw !M! card.

theHuman:PocketPistol.NAME: Pocket Pistol
theHuman:PocketPistol.DESCRIPTION: Shoot ( !D! x !M!,  !theHuman:SecondMagic! %  ) a random enemy. NL This does not produce Empty Cartridges.

theHuman:ConcealedCarry.NAME: Concealed Carry
theHuman:ConcealedCarry.DESCRIPTION: Add a Pocket Pistol to your hand.

theHuman:Disposal.NAME: Disposal
theHuman:Disposal.DESCRIPTION: Discard any amount of cards. For each card discarded this way, find 1 Junk.

theHuman:Survivalist.NAME: Survivalist
theHuman:Survivalist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies and gain !B! Block multiplied by the number of Junk in your hand.

theHuman:Risktaker.NAME: Risktaker
theHuman:Risktaker.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Uncover 2 cards.

theHuman:Salvage.NAME: Salvage
theHuman:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Return !M! random cards from your discard pile to your hand.

theHuman:RenewableContract.NAME: Renewable Contract
theHuman:RenewableContract.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, choose !M! card from the discard pile and return it to your hand.

theHuman:Sanitation.NAME: Sanitation
theHuman:Sanitation.DESCRIPTION: Replay all cards that you have Exhausted this combat.

theHuman:Preparation.NAME: Preparation
theHuman:Preparation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL Next turn, gain !M! Block and draw !theHuman:SecondMagic! cards.

theHuman:Refresh.NAME: Refresh
theHuman:Refresh.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If this card is discarded, draw !M! cards and restore !M! health.

theHuman:CautiousBlow.NAME: Cautious Blow
theHuman:CautiousBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL Gain !B! Block. NL [#a83277]Technique: Gain 5 Block.

theHuman:HeelKick.NAME: Heel Kick
theHuman:HeelKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy 2 times. NL [#a83277]Technique: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 2 times.

theHuman:AWP.NAME: AWP
theHuman:AWP.DESCRIPTION: Shoot ( !D! x !M!,  !theHuman:SecondMagic! %  ) an enemy. NL Next turn, deal 10 damage to the same enemy. NL Return this to your hand. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Inventory.

theHuman:LegalAction.NAME: Legal Action
theHuman:LegalAction.DESCRIPTION: Stun an enemy for 1 turn. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a Poverty into your deck.

theHuman:Poverty.NAME: Poverty
theHuman:Poverty.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this, lose 3 health.

theHuman:Angst.NAME: Angst
theHuman:Angst.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards. NL If you have more than 5 cards in your hand, discard your hand.

theHuman:TurboSlap.NAME: Turbo Slap
theHuman:TurboSlap.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL Draw 1 card.

theHuman:LivingItUp.NAME: Living It Up
theHuman:LivingItUp.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your draw pile. For each card Exhausted this way, Uncover a card and add it to your draw pile.

theHuman:Berreta92.NAME: Berreta 92
theHuman:Berreta92.DESCRIPTION: Shoot ( !D! x !M!,  !theHuman:SecondMagic! %  ) an enemy. NL Return this to your hand. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Inventory.

theHuman:Glock17.NAME: Glock 17
theHuman:Glock17.DESCRIPTION: Shoot ( !D! x !M!,  !theHuman:SecondMagic! %  ) an enemy. NL Return this to your hand. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Inventory.

theHuman:QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
theHuman:QuickDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a Weapon. NL Shoot ( !D! x !M!,  !theHuman:SecondMagic! %  ) a random enemy.

theHuman:DoubleTap.NAME: Double Tap
theHuman:DoubleTap.DESCRIPTION: The next time you Shoot an enemy, Shoot them again with the same Weapon.
theHuman:DoubleTap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next time you Shoot an enemy, Shoot them again with the same Weapon 2 times.

theHuman:Physiotherapy.NAME: Physiotherapy
theHuman:Physiotherapy.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 5 cards. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Healthiness.

theHuman:FitAsAFiddle.NAME: Fit As A Fiddle
theHuman:FitAsAFiddle.DESCRIPTION: If you have more than !M! Healthiness, take another turn after this one. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaustive 2.

theHuman:Party.NAME: Party
theHuman:Party.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you discard this, gain !M! energy and draw !theHuman:SecondMagic! cards.

theHuman:Arcade.NAME: Arcade
theHuman:Arcade.DESCRIPTION: For each energy you have, deal !D! damage to a random enemy and Uncover a card.

theHuman:Ageing.NAME: Ageing
theHuman:Ageing.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Ageing to all enemies. NL [#34eb52]Pacifist: Gain 10 Block.

theHuman:LayDownArms.NAME: Lay Down Arms
theHuman:LayDownArms.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Attacks and this card from your deck permanently. NL Draw a card. NL [#34eb52]Pacifist: Draw 5 cards instead.

theHuman:MidlifeCrisis.NAME: Midlife Crisis
theHuman:MidlifeCrisis.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Weak to an enemy. NL Draw !M! cards. NL [#34eb52]Pacifist: Apply 99 Weak instead.

theHuman:Nap.NAME: Nap
theHuman:Nap.DESCRIPTION: Put an enemy to sleep for !M! turns. NL [#34eb52]Pacifist: Restore 5 health.

theHuman:Discourage.NAME: Discourage
theHuman:Discourage.DESCRIPTION: Remove all buffs from an enemy. NL [#34eb52]Pacifist: Also apply 3 Weak to it.

theHuman:Speedloader.NAME: Speedloader
theHuman:Speedloader.DESCRIPTION: While this is in your hand, whenever you Shoot a Weapon, Shoot (4 x 2, 10 %) a random enemy.

theHuman:FreedomOfMind.NAME: Freedom Of Mind
theHuman:FreedomOfMind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card, play the top card of your deck.

theHuman:Arsenal.NAME: Arsenal
theHuman:Arsenal.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Weapon with Shoot to your hand. NL It Purges when used and at the end of your turn.
